br.octahedron.cotopaxi.metadata.annotation
Annotation Type Response

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Response

TODO COMMENTS!!!

Author:
Danilo Penna Queiroz - email@octahedron.com.br

Optional Element Summary
 String[] acceptableFormats
          Specify the acceptable formats for response.
 String returnName
          The result's value name to be used at the template and, if required, store on session.
 boolean storeOnSession
          Used to indicate that the return value should be stored on Session.
 

returnName

public abstract String returnName
The result's value name to be used at the template and, if required, store on session. If not given the value will be add to the attributes map and session the simple class name, in lower case.

See Also:
Class.getSimpleName()
Default:
"[default]"

storeOnSession

public abstract boolean storeOnSession
Used to indicate that the return value should be stored on Session.

Default:
false

acceptableFormats

public abstract String[] acceptableFormats
Specify the acceptable formats for response. The first format will be considered as the default format to be used. This array can't be empty.

Returns:
A list of all possible formats for response.
Default:
"html"
